column5: Very cool. Are you using lake water? How often is the water changed up?

Started with tap water this year on all of them, I had my school using well water up until this year, we are going to be adding chemical to get rid of the chlorine & my school's will be letting the water sit for 2 or 3 days, once they start to feed somewhere around Christmas they need to have a pail of water taken out 2 or 3 times a week Mon, Wed & Fri Tight Lines SBK
This program is an outstanding contribution to our communities ....Good on ya ALL Richard...much respect!
